name: Quaint Suites Hotel & Banquet
address: Sakivhar complex, off sakivihar Road Behind Ansa Industrial Estate, Sakinaka Andheri (E), Mumbai 400 072
description: Quaint Suites Hotel & Banquet features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV in the Powai district of Mumbai. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. There is a restaurant serving Chinese cuisine, and free private parking is available. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a vegetarian breakfast. Phoenix Market City Mall is 3.8 km from Quaint Suites Hotel & Banquet, while Powai Lake is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: all day place shibuya
description: Conveniently situated in Tokyo, all day place shibuya provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The hotel features family rooms. All units in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Guest rooms in all day place shibuya are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near all day place shibuya include Ancient Egyptian Art Museum, Shidax Culture Hall and Hachiko Statue. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Yanh Ratchawat Hotel
description: Located in Bangkok, 4.2 km from Wat Saket, YANH Ratchawat Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Bangkok National Museum is 5.3 km away and Jim Thompson House is 5.3 km from the hotel. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. The restaurant at YANH Ratchawat Hotel serves Thai cuisine. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Khao San Road is 4.8 km from YANH Ratchawat Hotel, while Siam Discovery is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.
